item.name: DataSet1
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.LineNumber, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.Recorder, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.SecondPeriod, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.MinutePeriod, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.HourPeriod, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.DayPeriod, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.WeekPeriod, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.MonthPeriod, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.YearPeriod, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.Company, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.PlanningPeriod, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.StructuralUnit, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.BusinessActivity, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.GLAccount AS Item, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.AmountIncomeTurnover, FinancialResultForecastTurnovers.AmountExpenseTurnover, 0 AS OperationalGainLoss, 0 AS ProfitLossRejection, 0 AS ProfitLossPercent, 0 AS IncomeRejection, 0 AS IncomePercent, 0 AS ExpenseVariance, 0 AS ExpensePercent FROM AccumulationRegister.FinancialResultForecast.Turnovers(, , Auto, PlanningPeriod = &PlanningPeriod OR &PlanningPeriod = VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.EmptyRef)) AS FinancialResultForecastTurnovers

item.name: DataSet2
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN FinancialResultTurnovers.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE FinancialResultTurnovers.Recorder END AS Recorder, FinancialResultTurnovers.SecondPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.MinutePeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.HourPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.DayPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.WeekPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.MonthPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.YearPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.Company, FinancialResultTurnovers.StructuralUnit, FinancialResultTurnovers.BusinessActivity, FinancialResultTurnovers.CustomerOrder, FinancialResultTurnovers.GLAccount AS Item, FinancialResultTurnovers.AmountIncomeTurnover AS AmountIncomeTurnoverFact, FinancialResultTurnovers.AmountExpenseTurnover AS AmountExpenseTurnoverFact, 0 AS OperatingProfitLossFact, 0 AS ProfitLossRejection, 0 AS ProfitLossPercent, 0 AS IncomeRejection, 0 AS IncomePercent, 0 AS ExpenseVariance, 0 AS ExpensePercent FROM AccumulationRegister.FinancialResult.Turnovers(, , Auto, ) AS FinancialResultTurnovers

totalField.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover) IS NULL OR SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL (SUM(AmountIncomeTurnoverFact), 0) - SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover)) * 100 / SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover) END

CASE WHEN SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover) IS NULL OR SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL (SUM(AmountExpenseTurnoverFact), 0) - SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover)) * 100 / SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover) END

CASE WHEN SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover) IS NULL OR SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover)-SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL(SUM(AmountIncomeTurnoverFact), 0) - ISNULL(SUM(AmountExpenseTurnoverFact), 0) - (SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover)-SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover)) ) * 100 / ( SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover)-SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover) ) END
